channel.title: Comments on: Getting Pulverized by Tygem Dans

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: I'll be sure to add theme to the queue for Monday Go Meditations, but man that list is starting to get long. I may have to start adding games records into these posts with only a small amount of commentary so that it doesn't take too long for them to be released. So long answer shortened, yes I'll be sure to post them up with some commentary soon.
item.content:encoded:
I’ll be sure to add theme to the queue for Monday Go Meditations, but man that list is starting to get long. I may have to start adding games records into these posts with only a small amount of commentary so that it doesn’t take too long for them to be released.
So long answer shortened, yes I’ll be sure to post them up with some commentary soon.

item.title: By: Marek Jasovsky
item.dc:creator: Marek Jasovsky
item.description: Hi Are you gonna post here some games ( with reviews? ) Thx
